resources.string: Computer vision is a field in which we process and identify images in the same way human vision does and thus providing with appropriate ouput. (This app will enable you to learn how we interact with images in computer vision).

Machine Learning is a field in which we give computers the ability to automatically learn and improve from experience without explicitly being told what to do so at every step. After learning, these computers can predict the outcome on their own. (This app will describe the various algorithms used for such purpose as well as the terminologies).
These are the various methods we use to increase the accuracy of our algorithms by reducing error to a minimum. (We will understand the various formulas used in this regard).

Deep Learning is a sub-field of machine learning to make deep networks corresponding to the neural network we have in our brains for computer learning purposes. (This app will teach you the complexity of these networks).
